author: Staff Reporter
text:
Amidst tight security, P. Pandi alias Attack Pandi (40) of Keerathurai in Madurai was produced before Tiruchendur Judicial Magistrate Court on Tuesday in connection with a case of assault.

During the by-election for Tiruchendur constituency in 2009, Pandi, along with a group of men, allegedly attacked N. Sankar, an AIADMK functionary from Virudhachalam. The incident occurred on December 15, 2009, and Kulasekarapattinam police filed a case in this regard. Judicial Magistrate Irudhayarani adjourned the case till February 16.
title: ‘Attack’ Pandi produced before Tiruchendur court
